com.heat.engine.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heat.engine.Engine
      • com.heat.engine.game.Game

  • public abstract class Game
extends Engine
    The Game class is created to simplify the creation of games with
    the engine.
    Instead of just importing and using static methods, this will give you a
    class to extend to, this makes it easier.

    Also this class contains game specific methods and variables.
    The core Engine class is just the main engine.
    Since:
    2016-02-17
    Author:
    Pontus Wirsching

      • debug

        private static int debug
        Debug variable.
        There are different kinds of debug levels: 
         ----------------------
 | value |   about
 ----------------------
 |   0   | Disabled
 |   1   | Simple info
 |   2   | Standard info
 |   3   | Detailed info
 |   4   | Everything
 ----------------------

      • enableDebugging

        public void enableDebugging()
        Enables the game debug mode.
        This will also set the debug level to 1 which is the most basic one.
        Since:
        2016-02-17
